post.author: MaximilianKohler
post.body:
http://www.sevenforums.com/gaming/37743 ... error.html

is this site the only place to get tech support for this game btw? I see here their support is down http://www.idsoftware.com/games/quake/q ... on=support
nvm found this http://quake4.filefront.com/news/Activi ... Page;22426

tried 10.4 drivers, still happens


EDIT: fixed, it was a problem either with my copy of the game or the patch not installing properly
